channel.title: Preventing Multi Attacking Clicking
channel.description: Is there any way to make it so that if a person clicks so much on another player/npc it wont do that much damage so it makes them wait between hits, Ive seen this on some servers but I cant quite figure out how to do this..

item.title: Preventing Multi Attacking Clicking
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

hm lol?

You think its simple buts i dont think it is at all and thats not the point the point is say… Somone is fighting another person with a great axe… If they click 5 times it hits them 5 times, I jsut need to know how to make it so no mater how many times they click they have to follow the wep speeds

Read full topic
